page.title: 11SHOPS 1
page.content: In our area we have six shops. Most of them are open throughout the year and all of them are much busier in summer when the tourists arrive. Here are some descriptions of each shop. {Quaker}is over 200 years old. It used to be the old Quaker Meeting House. It is owned by Mr and Mrs Hunter. They sell things like sweets,tobacco, groceries and news papers they sell comics as well.The most popular things they sell are sweets and cigarettes. The shop opens at 7.30am.till 6pm. {SPAR}shop is over 90 years old. The shop is owned by Mr and Mrs Prince. The best months for shopping in the store are June,July and August. They sell things like wines,spirits,bread, groceries,biscuits and cooked meat. There are 3_6 workers in the shop.The shop opens at 8 o'clock and closes at 6 o'clock.Mr. Barber owns a Fish Shop.
